summary: A New Zealand man recently estranged from his family gets unwittingly caught up in a revolution.
cast: Sam Neill|Nevan Rowe|Ian Mune|Warren Oates|Ian Watkin|Clyde Scott|Donna Akersten|William Johnson|Don Selwyn|Davina Whitehouse|Melissa Donaldson|Dougal Stevenson|Bernard Kearns|Raf Irving|Cass Donaldson|Tommy Tinirau|Snuffles|Roger Oakley|Dorothy McKegg|Tony Groser|Bernard Moody|Laurie Dee|Ron Cameron|Rod Collison|Ken Smith|Richard Moss|Norman Fawsey|Peter Rowell|Chris Parkinson|Bill Juliff|Pat Hoff|Tom Binns|Les Hunt|Shirley Duke
title: Perros de presa
